name: Sleep Girl
description:
A short vn about dating a couple of girls with psychological problems.

You've slept in and dreamed your way into the Angel World. A weird cat introduces you to his friends.

There's Angel Baby, a former rockstar with a drinking problem.

There's Tiffany Serpentine, a narcissistic snake designer.

And finally, there's Lottie, a cat girl who hangs out at the abandoned theme park.

It takes about 15 mins to play through every route. 

Each route only takes about five minutes.

There's three secret endings/second dates depending on the answers you choose.

You can play it in your browser, or download it if you want to play it without internet.

The font is by emhuo and it's called NicoClean_Monospaced. It's part of the NicoFontJam pack which you can find on itch.io.
